main.name: Ryan DeCoster
main.description: I am an engineer with  a passion for creating products that will excite and delight the user. With over 6 years experience as a product developer, and project manager with other experiences in research, and quality.I have spent most of my career looking for innovative solutions to complex problems to benefit the consume
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Primary Skilled in Javascript with React, Node.Js, and SQL databases to build full stack web applications. I also experience horizontally scaling deployed apps via AWS EC2 instances, tuning my applications via k6, and new relic to help with load testing. Other technologies of note include GIT, NPM, Webpack, CSS modules, Jest/Enzyme, Mocha/Chai, Axios, Nginx, Heroku, Google App Engine, Linux, and VS Code.

education.description: Studied Food Science & Technology with minors in chemistry, and business entrepreneurship.

work.title: Senior UX God

skills.name: React JS
skills.text: Skilled in react and able to create rich web applications that can render new information dynamically.

skills.name: NodeJS/Express
skills.text: Using Node.Js as my server-side runtime environment with the Express Framework I am able to quickly build lightweight, fast, and scalable backend.

skills.name: CSS3+/HTML5
skills.text: The latest evolution of HTML and CSS, able to create multi media and User-friendly web pages with advanced new styling features.

skills.name: Styled Components
skills.text: A CSS-in-JS styling framework that allows rapid built of custom reusable React components

skills.name: SQL
skills.text: A relation database that I am able to build databases from scratch via the command line interface. Experiences in optimizing search speeds, importing data, and deploying in the cloud.

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.text: A non-relational database I used to create rapid mvp of applications when the data format can change over the development processes, easy to scale horizontally.

skills.name: Docker
skills.text: Able to containerize and deploy full stack applications and leverage docker compose for fast containerization. Experienced in deploying via AWS EC2 instances.

skills.name: AWS
skills.text: Able to deploy and horizontally scale full stack applications hosted by AWS on EC2 instances and host data using S3. Using leveragesing amazons backed in services or building from scratch.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Ryan DeCoster must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
